ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Wrong, the line of spell has both uses. Either to get rid of DOT spells or siphon off mob s buff. What is really greaty with it is that you can use them on
ygData.messageBody:
Wrong, the line of spell has both uses.

Either to get rid of DOT spells or siphon off mob's buff. What is really
greaty with it is that you can use them on mobs and they wont register it
as an attack, leaving them open for tashan line after that.


Ibnabeth/ FINO


At 14:12 01/07/1999 EDT, you wrote:
>From: Nsane98@...
>
>cancel magic is an offensive spell, not defensive. So many people mistake
>the use of this spell. Imagine being in a duel with a cleric. I bet hes
>surprised when you cancel magic his +400 hp buffs away. same for npcs your
>fighitng, use cancel magic on the spells that are helping them. It's an
>offensive spell, and was designed that way.
>
>-Kanamar
